subject: Speakjet Box # 2 finished.
author: dead.science
full_text:
Hi:
I just finished the second of my speakjet boxes.  I just posed a pic
of it under deadscience in the photos section.  I am giving this one
to Regan and Vinny of APART.  They are both so dedicated to research
that I am certain we will get much for the group.  I took box # 1 into
the Seattle Underground and got some great 2 way real time
conversations.  I will be doing an entire show on these boxes and the
Underground investigation this weekend.
Rob.
